headline: DTE Energy Board of Directors declares quarterly dividend
summary: (NYSE: DTE) -- The DTE Energy Board of Directors declared a $1.165 per share dividend on its common stock payable April 15, 2026, to shareholders of record at the close of business March 16, 2026.
